publication includes measures of colour? (yes = 1, no = 0)

methods - does the paper refer to a previous publication of the same authors or different authors for data / parameters / how the metrics were calculated? (0/1)  (i.e. do you have to search through mutliple references to find the methods)
study type - spec (1), camera (2), both (3), neither (4)
hardware - spectrophotometer reported? (0/1)
hardware - make and model of light source reported (0/1) (for cameras include lighting conditions, for specs include lightsource)
hardware - camera & lens (and any filters used) (0/1), no camera? NA
hardware - white standard type reported? (0/1) (can be grey standard for photography)
hardware - dark standard type reported? (0/1)
software - brand, version, etc reported (0/1)
software - number of spectra OR PIXELS averaged reported (0/1)
software - integration time reported (0/1)
angle of specing reported (0 no, 1 yes) (45, 90, can be called normal, coincident, perpendicular, etc)
distance between light source and surface measured - standardized is not enough - we need the measurement to repeat the exp (NA for camera studies)

justification of choices made during spectra or pixel capture / sampling design / behaviour of researcher (KU: not sure waht happened to the column about angle that probe is held at (45 or 90) but I think that should be part of what we're trying to record here) (0/1)
analysis - Type of analysis/analyses (e.g. colormetrics, PCA on raw spectra, visual models: quantum catch, tetrahedral colour space, ....)
metrics - what metrics were calculated (not binary) (e.g) if they calculated colormetrics, then in here include what colourmetrics they calculated: hue, chroma, etc
definition of colourmetrics or reference to definition - i.e. How EXACTLY did they calculate colourmetrics
metrics - (do they justify their choice from the previous column?) justification of metrics included in and excluded from final analysis (0/1)
figures - inclusion of reflectance spectra (0/1) (put NA if the study uses photos)
metrics - mentioned type of irradiance used (D65, measured or otherwise)? (0/1) (NA if no visual model)
metrics - justification of iradiance measure used, (D65, measured or otherwise)? (0/1)
Visual model chosen mentioned?
Visual model chosen justified? (0/1)
mentions choice of speices for visual model (0/1)
visual model - justify choice of species for visual model (0/1)
